t: Watch The Story of HD Retrovision | Prime Video
s: After a successful Kickstarter campaign, Ste Kulov and Nick Mueller of HD Retrovision are creating component cables for retro consoles to make them look better on televisions with supported inputs. We talk to them about the origins of the project, the challenges of building a high quality cable ...
